title: Apple’s reign as world’s top stock at risk from bumpy 2024 start
text: Apple shares fell 0.4% Friday to close at about $181 after the New York Times reported that the Justice Department is closer to filing an antitrust case against the company. The decline notched the fifth consecutive negative day for Apple, its longest losing streak since October.
